**Add event lifecycle & post-event media**

Description
-----------
Maintain event history for ended events and allow adding post-event photos and videos to display in the event's history page.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Ability to mark events as ended/completed.
- UI or endpoints to upload post-event photos/videos tied to a completed event.
- Show post-event media on the event detail page.

Labels: feature, frontend, backend
Estimate: small
